page.title: 09POLITICAL MAKE-UP
page.content: {Crickhowell}is part of the{Borough of {Brecknock}and the{County of Powys.}It is represented on the Borough by the {Labour}Councillor Mr. D.Jeremiah and on the County by the{Independent Councillor Dr.G. Herdman. Crickhowell also has a{Community Council which has eleven members. This council has no powers but is allowed to make recommendations to the other councils. The Borough is mainly responsible for {roads, public health}and{housing. The County spends most of its money on {Education}and{Policing. All the councils get their money from a local tax on housing called the {rates.
